title: Der Jäger von Fall retro blackletter-like face (1950s)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830111739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/02_3441.jpg)

Dear Type-Freaks,  
here is the last font i need for my 50s-retro-project.  
Maybe someone of you can tell me the name of this  
font i found on a movie-poster in the web. Maybe  
you can tell me a similar type...

Thank you very much for your help...

Greets  
Carpio :)
author: Carpio

comments.content:
Well, it's not an identical match but it shares a lot of the same feeling. Check out Fakir from Underware:

[http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=fakir&id2=black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830111739/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=fakir&id2=black "http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=fakir&id2=black")

A very nice site!  
Thank you very much for helping me.

Thanx  
Carpio
